function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of control of COVID-19 in informal settlements","Impact":"Rapid escalation of outbreak, limited time for planning","Mitigation":"Preparedness and early action by local governments and communities","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, testing and tracking technologies","People":"Residents of informal settlements, local governments, communities","Owner":"Local governments, communities, advocacy agencies"}]}
